scenarios.name: Library
scenarios.description: You are peacefully checking your studying at the library's third floor until a sudden noise disturbs you. The student in front of you is staring at you and growling...and other students seem to be in a similar state. It seems that two PHD students at 'Campus Mar' have accidentally developed a virus that turns people aggressive, and improves their physicality! One of those students has arrived at 'Campus Poblenou' and the sickness is spreading. Leave the campus ASAP.

decision_options.response: Take the stairs to the hall
decision_options.narrative_before: Wow! That was a long way down! It's so silent, I wonder if... Oh, no! Some enemies are approaching you!
